display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (REM): Apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of REM sleep from type II polysomnography
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp4 + hrop4 + carbp4 + carop4 + oarbp4 + oarop4 ) / minremp
